TechFest 2024 - Mystery Box Challenge

Think Fast. Innovate with Surprise Elements!

Date of Event

20th November 2024

Coordinators

Teacher: Prof. Jane Doe

Student: Vivek Kumar Ray

About the Mystery Box Challenge

The Mystery Box Challenge is an exhilarating test of creativity, where participants are given a box filled with surprise materials. Your task is to create something unique using only the items in the box. Whether it's a product, artwork, or something entirely unexpected, this challenge pushes your innovation to the limits!

Teams or individuals must think on their feet and work with the resources provided. Showcase your ability to improvise and present your creation to a panel of judges. The Mystery Box Challenge is all about fast thinking, creativity, and problem-solving.

Rules and Regulations

  • Participants can compete as individuals or in teams of up to 3 members.
  • You must use only the materials provided in the mystery box.
  • Time limit: 90 minutes to complete your creation.
  • Judging criteria: Creativity, practicality, and presentation.
  • Participants must present their creations to the judges at the end of the challenge.

Ready to Join the Challenge?

Sign up now and let your creativity shine in the Mystery Box Challenge!
